channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Index Research for LA7, 18 April 2019 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Movimento 5 Stelle (EFDD): 14–19 seats
  • Partito Democratico (S&D): 12–17 seats
  • Lega Nord (EAPN): 22–29 seats
  • Forza Italia (EPP): 6–9 seats
  • Fratelli d’Italia (ECR): 0–5 seats
  • Liberi e Uguali (S&D): 0–5 seats
  • Più Europa (ALDE): 0–3 seats
